paymentFailure.title: Unable to renew your subscription
paymentFailure.description: There was a problem with your subscription payment. Choose how you want to proceed:
paymentFailure.explanation: Your automatic billing attempts have failed. You can renew now or return to the free plan.
paymentFailure.optionRenew: Renew: Keep all features and students from your current plan
paymentFailure.optionDowngrade: Free plan: Limited features, may need to remove excess students
paymentFailure.downgradedSuccessfully: Downgrade completed successfully. Your pending invoices have been cancelled.
paymentFailure.errorDowngrading: Error during downgrade. Please try again.

cancellation.title: Cancel Subscription
cancellation.financialModuleWarning: You have the financial module active. Cancellation will result in:

consequences.invoicesWillBeCancelled: All pending invoices will be cancelled
consequences.loseFinancialAccess: You will lose access to the financial module
consequences.noRefunds: No refunds for periods already charged
consequences.dataWillBePreserved: Your data will be preserved for 90 days

cancellation.simpleConfirmationDescription: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription? It will be cancelled at the end of the current period.

planChange.title: Plan Change Confirmation
planChange.description: Review the information below before proceeding
planChange.cancellationWarning: By confirming, your {currentPlan} subscription will be cancelled immediately. You will no longer have access to the exclusive features of this plan after cancellation.
planChange.excessStudentsDescription: You currently have {current} students, but the {plan} plan only allows {limit} students.
planChange.excessStudentsAction: After the plan change, you will need to select which {limit} students to keep. The {excess} unselected students will be permanently removed from the system.
planChange.step1: Your {currentPlan} plan will be cancelled immediately
planChange.step2: You will be redirected to the {newPlan} plan checkout
planChange.step3: After payment, the new plan will be activated
planChange.step4: You will need to select which students to keep in the system

warning.title: Plan Downgrade Warning
warning.description: You are about to change to a plan with fewer student slots
warning.planWillChange: Your plan will be changed and billing adjusted
warning.keepCurrentPlan: Keep current plan: Cancel this change
warning.chooseHigherPlan: Plan that accommodates all students: Choose a plan with higher limit
warning.payForExtra: Extra students: Pay $5.00/month for each additional student

selection.title: Mandatory Student Selection
selection.description: Your plan has changed to one with a lower student limit. Select which students you want to keep.
selection.mustSelect: You must select exactly {limit} student(s) from {total} current ones.
selection.willBeDeleted: The {count} unselected student(s) will be PERMANENTLY DELETED from the system, including all data, classes, reports and history.
selection.cannotBeUndone: This action cannot be undone. Consider upgrading your plan to keep all students.
selection.studentsToBeDeleted: Students that will be permanently deleted:
selection.errorProcessing: Error processing downgrade. Please try again.
